review: Watch Youtube and Netflix and nearly anything you can stream to Chrome browser.  Initially I had a lot of trouble with the controls (stop/play/pause/etc.) on my phone maintaining the connection.  I've have to futz with Netflix, and/or the Chromecast app to get controls, and real quick hit the button before I lost connectivity.  On the last update of Chromecast and Netflix seems like these issues are behind us - last couple times I used it the control stayed active the whole time - 2 movies.

review: I like my Chromecast but it is pretty limited in playback abilities. Programs that are meant to work with the Chromcast such as Youtube and Netflix work really well. Sometimes the chromecast will freeze when casting from other video websites and sometimes the sound does not work. Overall I'm happy with what I got for the price of the Chromecast and just had higher expectations for a Google product. It works most of the time and does an overall good job in casting from my tablet and computer to my TV. I would recommend this streaming player over others out there on the market.
